name: Chill Bro!
description:
THIS GAME IS FOR YOU TO RELAX IN YOUR ROOM! IN THE GAME YOU ARE IMMEDIATELY TRANSPORTED TO A QUIET ATTEMPT WITH A COOLING AMBIENT SOUND WITH A MIDDLE NIGHT IN THE MIDDLE OF A LONE CITY DOWNLOAD NOW! AND RELAX NOW! = CONTROLS =
  • LEFT CLICK = HIDE MOUSE
  • RIGHT CLICK = SPEED UP TIME IN GAME
  • MIDDLE CLICK = SHOW MOUSE
  • ESC = QUIT
= NOTE = this game is just the beginning. we have just developed it and maybe in the future, there will be updates for this game, such as a new place to relax, new features. what remains the most important thing from us for this game is the clean UI and EASY to PLAY! = THE DEVELOPER NOTE = Hi players!, we made this game with all our heart, Chill Bro game idea! it's 100% started from our mind!, we made this game with our mind and serenity, and we give you this free game!... If you want to support us YapGamedev, Follow us on Itch.io, and if you are interested in our games, click download!, If you want and don't mind to support us game developers Chill Bro! here, Donate as you wish! REMEMBER! no matter how much you donate, it will really help and support us!
